::Darkmouse::

Darkmouse nods. "Allrighty. Hey! Maybe we can rebuild this base 
instead. I liked it here kinda. We can use spare parts or something."

She sighs. "But then I guess a full base would be better."




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "I dont know, Dark Mouse. But I just recieved a delayed 
transmission in
> my head, from War. It was set to go off when he died, and the base 
was
> destroyed. He gave me the location of Destructors base. We'll wait 
for
> any others, like StarScream who is still missing. Then we'll go."
